abstract: Detroit Lions defensive end Ndamukong Suh will meet with N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell about his recent fines and penalties for illegal hits.
snippet: Detroit Lions defensive end Ndamukong Suh will meet with N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell about his recent fines and penalties for illegal hits.
lead_paragraph: If image is everything, then Detroit Lions defensive end Ndamukong Suh realizes he could have a problem.

headline.main: Suh and Goodell to Discuss Rules in Meeting
